IT’S ALL
HOMEMADE

All items are HOMEMADE and baked daily. We use fresh (when available) or frozen raw fruits to make all of our pie fillings. We make everything from scratch using only the best ingredients. Come in and try the difference that homemade makes! Please call 519-595-4407 to reserve your baking to avoid disappointment!

We decorate cakes too! Chocolate, Carrot, Marble, White Cake, or Black Forest. Available in many sizes.

*Please note we do not add preservatives to our baking*

*Please note: we are not a peanut free facility*

7AM – 8PM MONDAY – SATURDAY
CLOSED SUNDAYS & MONDAYS
DEBIT ACCEPTED, NO CREDIT CARDS

CUSTOMERSERVICE@ANNAMAES.CA
4060 72, MILLBANK ONTARIO
519-595-4407
